thread.section_title: Official Car Mats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Official Car Mats | officialcarmats.co.uk | 3 of 197
thread.title: Bryan P
thread.title_full: Official Car Mats reviewed by Bryan P

author: Bryan P
title: Bryan P
text:
Excellent friendly customer service - they clearly know what they are doing. The product is excellent and fits way better than the manufacturers supplied mats. I got the 'Luxury' range and the quality is superb, much better than the official manufacturers ones, And the price was almost 50 percent cheaper too. Delivery was swift and when I had a question, it was answered quickly and with the emphasis on customer service.
Can't recommend this company highly enough.
